item.title: Js Remote Jpeg to Pdf
item.description: installation sharp image-to-pdf image-size import sharp from 'sharp' import imgToPDF from "image-to-pdf" import imageSize from "image-size" const imagePath = './1.jpg' const pdfPath = './1.pdf' const imageBuffer = await (await request.get(url)).body() const jpgBuffer = await sharp(imageBuffer).jpeg({ mozjpeg: true }).toBuffer() fs.writeFileSync(imagePath, jpgBuffer) const size = imageSize(imagePath) const images = [imagePath] imgToPDF(images, [size.width, size.height]).pipe( fs.createWriteStream(pdfPath) );
